document_data.mainbody:
he Cascade was the palace and the seat of power in the Chondathan city of Iljak.
The Cascade was a large white marble building. The grand structure was not built as a palace but at some point before 1370 DR was repurposed to serve as the Governors seat of government.
Circa the , the Cascade was occupied by Governor Anton Yinoran whose rule was criticized as being puppeteered by Arrabar.
